description: This is not an app. After installation, it opens in a pdf document viewer. I am not sure how the book is but it is not an app and should not be listed in the software section at all.
summary: It is not an app. But a book

description:
Best place for it is here. I would not have found it otherwise.

On the other hand, I would have preferred an EPUB or similar. PDFs can be hard to read sometimes.
